post:
With all of the recent excitement we weren't able to release any promotions last month, so we made sure not to miss this month (no fools here!). ;)

We've decided to do something different this time around, we're offering promotions on our 256MB plans instead of our normal 128MB promotions.

**O256** OpenVZ w/256MB RAM, 512MB Burst, 15GB Disk Space, 1000GB Bandwidth, 1 IPv4 Address, 1 CPU Core = $2.99/month!
Promotion Code: 299O256

**X256** Xen PV w/256MB RAM, 256MB swap, 14GB Disk Space, 1000GB Bandwidth, 1 IPv4 Address, 2 CPU Cores = $5.99/month!
Promotion Code: 599X256

Location: Tampa, FL. (E Solutions)
ASN: AS54561
Test IP: 199.167.29.3
Test File: http://199.167.29.3/100MB.zip

Supported: TUN/TAP (OpenVPN) and PPTP
Future Support: IPv6 and IRC

[Link to additional specials.](http://securedragon.net/index.php?p=specials)
[SecureDragon.net](http://SecureDragon.net)

If you have additional questions, please view our knowledgebase and website as we try to keep them as informative as possible and most of the common questions are answered there. If they aren't feel free to ask me.

Enjoy! :)
